Description: Toshinori Yagi's Quirk, One for All, was transferred to him from Nana Shimura. This Quirk allowed him to stockpile an enormous amount of raw power, significantly enhancing all of his physical abilities to a superhuman level. After being grievously injured by All For One and transferring One For All to Izuku Midoriya, All Might retained only residual embers of his former Quirk.
